directions: Pour the beer into a saucepan, and bring to a boil. Add hot dog slices, and cook for about 5 minutes, until plump. Drain and discard beer, leaving hot dog slices in the pan. Stir in the baked beans and honey. Simmer over low heat for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package beef hot dogs, sliced into 1/4 inch slices
title: Jack's Beanie-Weenies
